import './FoodSearch.scss' import {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import useEdamamServices from '../../services/Edamam' import Autocomplete from '@mui/material/Autocomplete'; import TextField from '@mui/material/TextField'; import Stack from '@mui/material/Stack'; import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {searchFood,changeVariables} from './FoodSlice' import FoodItems from '../FoodItems/FoodItems' import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' const FoodSearch=()=>{ const [variables,setVariables]=useState([]) const {getAutoComplete}=useEdamamServices() const [food,setFood]=useState('') const dispatch=useDispatch() const {data,favoriteData}=useSelector(store=>store.food) useEffect(async()=>{ if(food.length>2) { const response= await getAutoComplete(food) setVariables(response) } },[food]) const onUpdateFood=(e)=>{ setFood(e.target.value) } return( <> Navbar Offcanvas Offcanvas

option)} renderInput={(params) => } />
) } export default FoodSearch;
